text: A devotee should begin his worship by making salutations to goddess Sarswati by chanting-- OM HRIM SARSWATYAI NAMAH.

He should then perform the rituals of 'Shadangnyas' by chanting the following mantras-- OM HRAM HRIDAYAY NAMAH, OM HRIM SHIRSE SWAHA, OM HOOM SHIKHAYAI VASHAT, OM HRAIM KAVACHAY HOOM, OM HRAUM NETRA TRAYAY VAUSHAT, OM HRAH ASTRAY PHAT.
title: Sarasvati Mantra
